definitions.text: an analysis (often in graphical form) representing the extent to which something exhibits various characteristics
examples: a psychological profile of serial killers

definitions.text: an outline of something (especially a human face as seen from one side)
degree of exposure to public notice
examples: that candidate does not have sufficient visibility to win an election

definitions.text: a vertical section of the Earth's crust showing the different horizons or layers

examples: The author of this article profiles a famous painter

definitions.text: represent in profile, by drawing or painting
